name: Scathelocke
flavor_text: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Using your grenade ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your subclass until you stow it.
perks.name: Osmosis

perks.description: Reloading after a final blow also reloads stowed weapons.
perks.name: Sympathetic Arsenal

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
perks.name: Multikill Clip

perks.description: This weapon becomes more accurate and boosts handling as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Eye of the Storm

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie
